Package lexa.core.expression.function.standard

This provides internal functions for the Lexa Expression Parser.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataFunctions

    InternalFunction

    MathsFunctions

    NullFunctions

    StringFunctions

Package lexa.core.expression.function.standard Description

This provides internal functions for the Lexa Expression Parser.

These are added to the function library and are available to all expressions.

The functions supported are grouped by type:

DataFunctions
Allows the manipulation of complete data sets.
MathsFunctions
Mathematical functions such as trigonometry.
NullFunctions
Handlers for when values are null.
StringFunctions
String manipulation functions
